verbs.description: Sen. John McCain [V: is] dropping any sense of pretense regarding his relationship with President Trump in his forthcoming new memoir .
[ARG0: Sen. John McCain] is [V: dropping] [ARG1: any sense of pretense regarding his relationship with President Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in his forthcoming new memoir] .
